article_title: 5 Scary Things Millennials Do With Money

article_metadata.author: Neale Godfrey

og.description: Millennials are doing a better job when it comes to budgeting, but they are still making plenty of money mistakes. As we make our way towards the end of the year, it is time for Millennials to clean those financial skeletons out of the closet and start anew. Here are five scary things Millennials do with money and how to fix them now!
